django.contrib.gis.feeds
========================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.feeds


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.feeds.GeoFeedMixin
   django.contrib.gis.feeds.GeoRSSFeed
   django.contrib.gis.feeds.GeoAtom1Feed
   django.contrib.gis.feeds.W3CGeoFeed
   django.contrib.gis.feeds.Feed


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: GeoFeedMixin

   This mixin provides the necessary routines for SyndicationFeed subclasses
   to produce simple GeoRSS or W3C Geo elements.


   .. py:method:: georss_coords(coords)

      In GeoRSS coordinate pairs are ordered by lat/lon and separated by
      a single white space. Given a tuple of coordinates, return a string
      GeoRSS representation.



   .. py:method:: add_georss_point(handler, coords, w3c_geo=False)

      Adds a GeoRSS point with the given coords using the given handler.
      Handles the differences between simple GeoRSS and the more popular
      W3C Geo specification.



   .. py:method:: add_georss_element(handler, item, w3c_geo=False)

      Add a GeoRSS XML element using the given item and handler.



.. py:class:: GeoRSSFeed(title, link, description, language=None, author_email=None, author_name=None, author_link=None, subtitle=None, categories=None, feed_url=None, feed_copyright=None, feed_guid=None, ttl=None, **kwargs)

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.utils.feedgenerator.Rss201rev2Feed`, :py:obj:`GeoFeedMixin`


   Base class for all syndication feeds. Subclasses should provide write()


   .. py:method:: rss_attributes()


   .. py:method:: add_item_elements(handler, item)

      Add elements on each item (i.e. item/entry) element.



   .. py:method:: add_root_elements(handler)

      Add elements in the root (i.e. feed/channel) element. Called
      from write().



.. py:class:: GeoAtom1Feed(title, link, description, language=None, author_email=None, author_name=None, author_link=None, subtitle=None, categories=None, feed_url=None, feed_copyright=None, feed_guid=None, ttl=None, **kwargs)

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.utils.feedgenerator.Atom1Feed`, :py:obj:`GeoFeedMixin`


   Base class for all syndication feeds. Subclasses should provide write()


   .. py:method:: root_attributes()

      Return extra attributes to place on the root (i.e. feed/channel) element.
      Called from write().



   .. py:method:: add_item_elements(handler, item)

      Add elements on each item (i.e. item/entry) element.



   .. py:method:: add_root_elements(handler)

      Add elements in the root (i.e. feed/channel) element. Called
      from write().



.. py:class:: W3CGeoFeed(title, link, description, language=None, author_email=None, author_name=None, author_link=None, subtitle=None, categories=None, feed_url=None, feed_copyright=None, feed_guid=None, ttl=None, **kwargs)

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.utils.feedgenerator.Rss201rev2Feed`, :py:obj:`GeoFeedMixin`


   Base class for all syndication feeds. Subclasses should provide write()


   .. py:method:: rss_attributes()


   .. py:method:: add_item_elements(handler, item)

      Add elements on each item (i.e. item/entry) element.



   .. py:method:: add_root_elements(handler)

      Add elements in the root (i.e. feed/channel) element. Called
      from write().



.. py:class:: Feed

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.contrib.syndication.views.Feed`


   This is a subclass of the `Feed` from `django.contrib.syndication`.
   This allows users to define a `geometry(obj)` and/or `item_geometry(item)`
   methods on their own subclasses so that geo-referenced information may
   placed in the feed.


   .. py:attribute:: feed_type


   .. py:method:: feed_extra_kwargs(obj)

      Return an extra keyword arguments dictionary that is used when
      initializing the feed generator.



   .. py:method:: item_extra_kwargs(item)

      Return an extra keyword arguments dictionary that is used with
      the `add_item` call of the feed generator.
